Create Sobek Input .DAT from

create_dat.Rd

Create Sobek Input .DAT from

create_dat(id.file = "", data.file = "", bnd.header = NULL,
  lat.header = NULL, factor = 1, bnd.out = NULL,
  lat.out = sub("boundary.dat", "lateral.dat", bnd.out, ignore.case =
  TRUE, fixed = TRUE), col.sep = "\t", dec.char = ",",
  output.case = NULL)

Arguments

id.file

Path to ID file
data.file

Path to Data file
bnd.header

Path to header file for boundary
lat.header

Path to header file for Lateral
factor

Vergrößerung Faktor
bnd.out

Output path for Boundary.dat (full file path)
lat.out

Output path for Lateral.dat (full file path)
col.sep

Column seperator of ID & Input Data files. Default TAB.
dec.char

Decimal character of ID & Input Data files. Default ","
output.case

Write output (boundary.dat, lateral.dat) direct to the case. Output.case must be a character vector combine (case.name, sobek.project) like c('case name', 'd:/so21302/main.lit')

Details

Example for id.file

Ahrahr_mess_fv_qFLBR id Ahr sc 0 lt 0 dc lt 1 0 0 PDIN 0 0 pdinLateral1
100Mai_23bad_vibel_mess_fv_qFLBO id Mai_23 st 0 ty 1 q_ dt 1 0 0 PDIN 0 0 pdinBoundary
1100L_10014432cochem_mess_qFLBO id Mosel_RE_N_P_P_0 st 0 ty 1 q_ dt 1 0 0 PDIN 0 0 pdin
Boundary1100Modaumodau_mess_fv_q
FLBR id Modau sc 0 lt 0 dc lt 1 0 0 PDIN 0 0 pdinLateral1100Mai_Lat_Schwb
schwarzbach_mess_fv_qFLBR id Mai_Lat_Schwb sc 0 lt 0 dc lt 1 0 0 PDIN 0 0 pdinLateral1100
